Articles.Content:
I have just recently started streaming on twitch, Mainly KSP, but a few other games also. I stream a Career mode, and a sandbox mode.

I would like to post a link but not sure if im allowed to or not? If not can anyone tell me some good places I can promote my stream? Im already using Twitter.

Thank you!
Also, as a newby to Twitch, any tips or pointers would be appreciated. What would YOU want to see in a live stream?
